result.ga: An bhfuil a dhath ar siúl
result.orig: An bhfuil a dhath ar siúl
result.html: An bhfuil a dhath ar siúlIs there anything happening?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil a ḋaṫ ar siúlIs there anything happening?

result.eng: Red and white colours alternated on it.
result.ga: Bhí dathanna dearga agus bána orthu ar aon
result.orig: Bhí dathanna dearga agus bána orthu ar aon
result.html: Bhí dathanna dearga agus bána orthu ar aonRed and white colours alternated on it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí daṫanna dearga agus bána orṫu ar aonRed and white colours alternated on it.

result.ga: Bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthi
result.orig: Bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthi
result.html: Bhí folt ar dhath an óir uirthiShe had gold-coloured hair.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí folt ar ḋaṫ an óir uirṫiShe had gold-coloured hair.

result.ga: Cén dath atá ar do chuid gruaige
result.orig: Cén dath atá ar do chuid gruaige
result.html: Cén dath atá ar do chuid gruaigeWhat colour is your hair?
result.ponchtml: Cén daṫ atá ar do ċuid gruaigeWhat colour is your hair?

result.eng: The colour is shading towards red.
result.ga: Tá an dath ag dul i leith an deirg
result.orig: Tá an dath ag dul i leith an deirg
result.html: Tá an dath ag dul i leith an deirgThe colour is shading towards red.
result.ponchtml: Tá an daṫ ag dul i leiṫ an deirgThe colour is shading towards red.

result.html: Tá dath na gréine ortYou have a tan.
result.ponchtml: Tá daṫ na gréine ortYou have a tan.

result.eng: You can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ga: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.orig: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.html: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat cúnaṁ a ṫaḃairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an daṫ ceart a roġnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.

result.html: Cén dath atá airWhat color is it?
result.ponchtml: Cén daṫ atá airWhat color is it?

result.ga: Tá dath uaine éadrom ar an gceann sin
result.orig: Tá dath uaine éadrom ar an gceann sin
result.html: Tá dath uaine éadrom ar an gceann sinThat one is light green.
result.ponchtml: Tá daṫ uaine éadrom ar an gceann sinThat one is light green.

result.eng: My brother likes the color purple.
result.ga: Is maith le mo dheartháir an dath corcra
result.orig: Is maith le mo dheartháir an dath corcra
result.html: Is maith le mo dheartháir an dath corcraMy brother likes the color purple.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ le mo ḋearṫáir an daṫ corcraMy brother likes the color purple.

result.eng: My brother likes the color purple.
result.ga: Is maith le mo dheartháir an dath corcra
result.orig: Is maith le mo dheartháir an dath corcra
result.html: Is maith le mo dheartháir an dath corcraMy brother likes the color purple.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ le mo ḋearṫáir an daṫ corcraMy brother likes the color purple.

result.eng: He had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ga: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.orig: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am air
result.html: Ní raibh bríste nó a dhath san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ bríste nó a ḋaṫ san am airHe had neither trousers nor anything else on at that time.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.

result.eng: He would never do anything to hurt her.
result.ga: Ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croí
result.orig: Ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croí
result.html: Ní dhéanfadh sé a dhath choíche a ghoinfeadh a croíHe would never do anything to hurt her.
result.ponchtml: Ní ḋéanfaḋ sé a ḋaṫ ċoíċe a ġoinfeaḋ a croíHe would never do anything to hurt her.
